announcement.name: LVA Launch
announcement.summary: We are excited to announce the launch of our new Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory Management application, now available in ServiceNow! This new application streamlines the process of requesting loaner vehicles and managing our vehicle inventory, providing you with a more efficient and user-friendly experience.
announcement.title: New Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory Management Application is Now Live!
